questionId = #{record.questionid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
subjectId = #{record.subjectid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
reward = #{record.reward,jdbcType=DOUBLE},

update v_homepage_list set questionId = #{record.questionid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, subjectId = #{record.subjectid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, reward = #{record.reward,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, answerTime = #{record.answertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, answerId = #{record.answerid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, likesNum = #{record.likesnum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, userId = #{record.userid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, gradeId = #{record.gradeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, studentName = #{record.studentname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, studentImg = #{record.studentimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rewardNum = #{record.rewardnum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, teacherImg = #{record.teacherimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teacherName = #{record.teachername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: (SELECT * FROM v_homepage_list WHERE gradeId =#{gradeId}) UNION (SELECT * FROM v_homepage_list)
(SELECT * FROM v_homepage_list WHERE gradeId =#{gradeId} AND subjectId=#{subjectId}) UNION (SELECT * FROM v_homepage_list where subjectId=#{subjectId})
(SELECT * FROM v_homepage_list WHERE gradeId =#{gradeId} ORDER BY likesNum DESC) UNION (SELECT * FROM v_homepage_list ORDER BY likesNum DESC)
SELECT * FROM v_homepage_list WHERE questionContent like CONCAT('%',#{query},'%')
